column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.1
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Segmentstructural|Category
#T_SP=webanno.custom.EXT|SEG

#Text=A document transmission method comprising the steps of : storing a plurality of data transmission formats respectively corresponding to a plurality of data transmission methods ; inputting document data to be transmitted ; inputting a plurality of designations to which the inputted data is to be transmitted ; designating one or more data transmission methods respectively corresponding to the plurality of destinations ; converting the input document data into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to inputted designations and their respective of transmission method ; and transmitting said converted document data to inputted destinations according to said designated transmission method .

#Text=The document transmission method according to claim 1 , further comprising the steps of : storing data transmission formats corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission method ; and if document data types are specified or determined , converting said input document data into data transmission formats corresponding to said document data types .

#Text=The document transmission method according to claim 1 , wherein before processing of the converting step , the designated one or more data transmission methods , determined by the designating step , are separated by data transmission format groups , and the converting step is performed for each group .

#Text=A document transmission method comprising the steps of : storing data transmission formats respectively corresponding to a plurality of data transmission destinations ; inputting document data to be transmitted ; designating one or more data transmission destinations to which the inputted data is to be transmitted ; converting said input document data into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated plural transmission destinations ; and transmitting said converted respective document data to said designated plural transmission destinations .

#Text=The document transmission method according to claim 4 , further comprising the steps of : storing data transmission formats corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission destinations ; and if document data types are specified or determined , converting said input document data into data transmission formats corresponding to said document data types .

#Text=The document transmission method according to claim 4 , wherein before processing of the converting step , the designated one or more data transmission destinations , determined by the designating step , are separated by data transmission format groups , and the converting step is performed for each group .

#Text=A document transmission method comprising the steps of : storing a plurality of data transmission formats respectively corresponding to a plurality of document data types and their respective data transmission method ; inputting document data to be transmitted ; inputting designation of said transmission methods ; inputting designation of document data types ; converting said input document data into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated document data types ; and transmitting said converted document data by said transmission methods .

#Text=A document transmission method comprising the steps of : storing data transmission formats respectively corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission destination ; inputting document data to be transmitted ; inputting designation of said transmission destinations ; inputting designation of document data types ; converting said input document data into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated document data types ; and transmitting said converted document data to said transmission destinations .

#Text=A document transmission method comprising the steps of : storing transmission methods and data transmission formats , respectively corresponding to a plurality of data transmission destinations ; inputting document data to be transmitted ; designating one or more data transmission destination to which the inputted data is to be transmitted ; converting said input document data into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated transmission destinations ; and transmitting said converted respective document data to said designated transmission destinations by corresponding transmission methods .

#Text=The document transmission method according to claim 9 , further comprising the steps of : storing data transmission formats corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission destinations ; and if document data types are specified and determined , converting input document data into data transmission formats corresponding to said document data types .

#Text=The document transmission method according to claim 9 , wherein before processing of the converting step , the designated one or more data transmission destinations , determined by the designating step , are separated by data transmission format groups , and the converting step is performed for each data transmission format group , and wherein the one or more data transmission destinations , contained in said each data transmission format group , are separated by data transmission method groups , and the transmitting step is performed for each data transmission method group .

#Text=A document processing apparatus comprising : storage means for storing a plurality of data transmission formats respectively corresponding to a plurality of data transmission methods ; input means for inputting document data to be transmitted , and inputting a plurality of designation to which the inputted data is to be transmitted ; designation means for designating one or more data transmission methods respectively corresponding to the plurality of destinations ; conversion means for converting the input document data into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to inputted designations and their respective of transmission method ; and transmission means for transmitting said converted document data to inputted destinations according to said designated transmission method .

#Text=The document processing apparatus according to claim 12 , wherein said storage means stores data transmission formats corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission method , and wherein if document data types are specified or determined , said conversion means converts said input document data into data transmission formats corresponding to said document data types .

#Text=The document processing apparatus according to claim 12 , further comprising classification means for classifying said designated one or more transmission methods based on data transmission format , wherein said conversion means performs format conversion at once on document data of the same data transmission format .

#Text=A document processing apparatus comprising : storage means for storing data transmission formats respectively corresponding to a plurality of data transmission destinations ; input means for inputting document data to be transmitted ; designation means for designating one or more data transmission destination to which the inputted data is to be transmitted ; conversion means for converting said document data , inputted by said input means , into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated transmission destinations ; and transmission means for transmitting said converted respective document data to said designated transmission destinations .

#Text=The document processing apparatus according to claim 15 , wherein said storage means stores data transmission formats corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission destination , and wherein if document data types are specified or determined , said conversion means converts said document data , inputted by said input means , into data transmission formats corresponding to said designated document data types .

#Text=The document processing apparatus according to claim 15 , further comprising classification means for classifying said designated one or more transmission destinations based on data transmission format , wherein said conversion means performs format conversion on document data of the same data transmission format .

#Text=A document processing apparatus comprising : storage means for storing a plurality of data transmission formats respectively corresponding to a plurality of document data types and their respective data transmission method ; input means for inputting document data to be transmitted ; designation means for designating said transmission methods and document data types ; conversion means for converting said document data inputted by said input means into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated document data types ; and transmission means for transmitting said converted document data by said transmission methods .

#Text=A document processing apparatus comprising : storage means for storing data transmission formats respectively corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission destination ; input means for inputting document data to be transmitted ; designation means for designating said transmission destinations and document data types ; conversion means for converting said document data inputted by said input means into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated document data types ; and transmission means for transmitting said converted document data to said transmission destinations .

#Text=A document processing apparatus comprising : storage means for storing transmission methods and data transmission formats , respectively corresponding to a plurality of transmission destinations ; input means for inputting document data to be transmitted ; designation means for designating one or more data transmission destination to which the inputted data is to be transmitted ; conversion means for converting said document data inputted by said input means into one or more data transmission formats corresponding to said designated transmission destinations ; transmission means for transmitting said converted respective document data to said designated transmission destinations by corresponding transmission methods .

#Text=The document processing apparatus according to claim 20 , wherein said storage means stores data transmission formats corresponding to document data types and their respective data transmission destinations , and wherein if document data types are specified and determined , said conversion means converts said document data into data transmission formats corresponding to said designated document data types .

#Text=The document processing apparatus according to claim 20 , further comprising first separate means for separating said designated one or more data transmission destinations by data transmission format groups , and second separate means for separating the one or more transmission destinations , contained in each data transmission format group , by data transmission method groups , wherein said conversion means performs format conversion on document data in each data transmission format group , and wherein said transmission means transmits the document data in each data transmission method group .

#Text=A transmission-destinationsetting method for a document transmission apparatus having a construction for transmitting document data from a reader , which reads document and generates document data , to a plurality of destinations by a plurality of transmission methods , said method comprising : a step of holding detailed destinations according to transmission methods and regulations by the transmission methods and an abstract destination as a set of detailed destinations each having a name ; and a step of holding a partial set of said abstract destination as a transmission destination group which is a set of destinations used in document data transmission .

#Text=The transmission-destination setting method according to claim 23 , further comprising a step of , if an abstract destination is designated , copying said abstract destination and a transmission destination group of said abstract destination into a destination list used for document transmission .

#Text=The transmission-destination setting method according to claim 24 , further comprising a step of adding a member to said transmission destination group held in said destination list by copying the member from members of a set of abstract destination .

#Text=The transmission-destinationsetting method according to claim 24 , further comprising : a step of deleting a member from the transmission destination group held in said destination list ; a step of judging whether or not a member exists in said transmission destination group held in said destination list ; and a step of deleting an abstract destination , where any member of said transmission destination group does not exist , from said destination list .

#Text=The transmission-destinationsetting method according to claim 23 , further comprising a step of remote-adding , remote-changing or remote-deleting a member with respect to said transmission destination group , from the outside of said document transmission apparatus .

#Text=A document transmission apparatus comprising : a reader which reads a document and generates document data ; transmission means for transmitting document data from said reader to a plurality of destinations by a plurality of transmission methods ; holding means for holding detailed destinations according to transmission methods and regulations by the transmission methods and an abstract destination as a set of detailed destination each having a name ; and selection means for selecting a transmission method and a transmission destination for document data from said reader , based on predetermined conditions , in accordance with designation of said abstract destination .

#Text=The document transmission apparatus according to claim 28 , wherein said selection means selects the transmission method and the transmission destination based on security of document data to be transmitted by said transmission means .

#Text=The document transmission apparatus according to claim 28 , wherein said selection means selects the transmission method and transmission destination based on priority of document data to be transmitted by said transmission means .

#Text=The document transmission apparatus according to claim 28 , said selection means selects the transmission method and the transmission destination based on position information of said document transmission apparatus and position information of the destination .

#Text=The document transmission apparatus according to claim 28 , wherein said selection means selects the transmission method and the transmission destination based on time of transmission of document data by said transmission means .

#Text=The document transmission apparatus according to claim 28 , wherein said selection means selects the transmission method and the transmission destination based on the amount of document data to be transmitted by said transmission means .

#Text=A document transmission apparatus control method comprising : an input step of inputting document data from a reader which reads a document and generates document data ; a transmission step of transmitting document data inputted at said input step to a plurality of destinations by a plurality of transmission methods ; a step of holding detailed destinations as destinations according to transmission methods and regulations by the transmission methods and an abstract destination as a set of detailed destinations each having a name ; and a selection step of selecting a transmission method and a transmission destination for transmitting the document data from said reader , based on predetermined conditions , in accordance with designation of said abstract destination .

#Text=A document transmission apparatus comprising : transmission means for transmitting data ; input means for inputting document data to be transmitted by said transmission means ; holding means for holding a set of destinations according to a plurality of transmission methods and regulations by said transmission methods , in correspondence with information indicative of a receiver ; first selection means for selecting a transmission method and a destination to be used for transmitting the document data inputted by said input means , based on predetermined conditions , in accordance with designation of said receiver , from information held in said holding means ; generation means for generating a notice of transmission indicating transmission of the document data inputted by said input means based on the transmission method and the destination selected by said first selection means ; and second selection means for selecting a transmission method and a destination for transmitting the notice of transmission generated by said generation means , based on predetermined conditions ; wherein said transmission means transmits the document data inputted by said input means based on the transmission method and the destination selected by said first selection means , while transmits the notice of transmission generated by said generation means based on the transmission method and the destination selected by said second selection means .

#Text=A document transmission apparatus control method comprising : a transmission step of transmitting data ; an input step of inputting document data to be transmitted at said transmission step ; a holding step of holding a set of destinations according to a plurality of transmission methods and regulations by said transmission methods , in correspondence with information indicative of a receiver ; a first selection step of selecting a transmission method and a destination for transmitting the document data inputted at said input step , based on predetermined conditions , in accordance with designation of said receiver ; a generation step of generating a notice of transmission indicative of transmission of document data inputted at said input step based on the transmission method and the destination selected at said first selection step ; and a second selection step of selecting a transmission method and a destination for transmitting the notice of transmission generated at said generation step based on predetermined conditions , wherein at said transmission step , said document data inputted at said input step is transmitted based on the transmission method and the destination selected at said first selection step , while the notice of transmission generated at said generation step is transmitted based on the transmission method and the destination selected at said second selection step .
